en.sc1: Now we will consider the best case cost.
en.sc2: The best case of insertion sort occurs when the array values are already in order from lowest to highest, as shown.
en.sc3: Every test on the inner for loop will fail immediately, and no values will be moved.
en.sc4: The total number of comparisons will be $n-1$, which is the number of times the outer for loop executes.
en.sc5: Therefore, the best case running time of insertion sort is $\theta(n)$.
